htmlbody:
Participedia reflects partnerships with organizations across the globe who share an interest in participatory politics and governance. The organizations listed below are co-signers to SSHRC Partnership Grant that was awarded to Particpedia for five years beginning in April 2015. Please contact us if you would like to discuss developing a partnership to support Participedia’s global mission.
